description: Martial artist and actor who enters the Shaolin Tournament to prove that he does not rely on special effects in his films.
name: Johnny Cage

description: Leader of the Black Dragon criminal empire, having been deported from both Japan and the United States, and becoming a wanted man in thirty-five other countries.

special.buttons: Block (hold) Forward, Down, Back, Up, Forward
special.name: Spin Attack

name: Kano

description: Sent by the Chinese ninja clan Lin Kuei to kill the host Shang Tsung.
name: Sub-Zero

description: United States Special Forces officer involved with the eponymous Mortal Kombat tournament through pursuit of her archenemy, the criminal leader Kano.

special.buttons: Down + Block + Low Punch + Low Kick
special.name: Leg Grab

name: Sonya Blade

description: God of thunder and protector of the Earth realm. He selects and trains warriors who defend the realm from various threats, while also participating directly in its defense.

finishing.buttons: Forward, Back, Back, Back, High Punch (close)
finishing.name: Fatality

name: Raiden

description: Chinese Shaolin kung fu monk who enters the tournament in order to protect Earth realm from being destroyed.

finishing.buttons: Block (hold) Forward, Down, Back, Up, Forward
finishing.name: Fatality

name: Liu Kang

description: Undead specter. A warrior who was killed by Sub-Zero and allowed to return to the physical realms in order to have his revenge.
name: Scorpion
